document_data.name: Bottomless Flask of Whisky
document_data.creator: Unknown [[elf]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''bottomless flask of whisky'''''The flask is never given an actual name; the name of this article is chosen only out of expedience. was an enchanted bronze flask that produced whisky. The [[elven]] brigand [[Kiril Duskmourn]] had one.
document_data.Description: The flask was forged of [[bronze]], with a greenish blue patina of verdigris covering a deranged face.{{cite book/Darkvision|33-34|4}} Kiril Duskmourn believed it may have been forged by [[elves]] outside of [[star elf|her lineage]]; she knew the face to be that of a god of the vine, though she didn't remember their name{{cite book/Stardeep|58}}
document_data.Powers: The flask produced whiskey whenever prompted. To Kiril Duskmourn's recollection, it had never failed to provide alcohol.
document_data.History: As of {{yearlink|1374}}, Kiril had carried the flask for years.
